valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 13 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 14 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low northwest FitzRoy 995 expected northeast FitzRoy 1007 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, cyclonic 3 to 5, becoming westerly 6 or 7 later. In east, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, increasing severe gale 9 at times, veering westerly 4 to 6 later.
Sea state
In west, very rough at first in northeast, otherwise moderate or rough. in east, rough or very rough.
Weather
In west, rain or showers. In east, rain or sleet.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally poor.

Gale warning
Issued:
15:50 (UTC) on Mon 12 Jan 2026
Southeasterly storm force 10 decreasing severe gale force 9 soon
